summary: New characters: Mikhail. New connections: Grushenka–Mikhail (romantic interest).
summary_short: Introduces Mikhail. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (78 ties). Key relationship types: romantic interest.
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (78), Dmitri Karamazov (76), Fyodor Karamazov (40), Ivan Karamazov (32)
story_summary: Alyosha visits Lise, who is seriously ill and expresses a desire for chaos and destruction. She reveals her dark thoughts and feelings, including a disturbing dream and a letter she insists Alyosha deliver to Ivan Fyodorovitch Karamazov immediately. After Alyosha leaves, Lise injures her finger slamming the door and laments her own wretchedness.
evidence_quotes: I should like some one to torture me, marry me and then torture me
Give it to him, you must give it to him! To‐day, at once
